doc.name: NCComponentBase
doc.description: Actor that serves as a placeholder for PtinyOS nesC modules and configurations. This class is a base class for nesC component classes. These are classes with source code defined in a .nc file intended for use with TinyOS to program the Berkeley Motes. This class provides a parameter source that is used to identify the nesC source file. It works in conjunction with the NCComponent MoML class, which attaches a tableau factory so that selecting the "Open Actor" menu choice will open the nesC source file.
doc.author: Elaine Cheong, Edward A. Lee, Yang Zhao
doc.property: The source code file or URL. The default value is "$PTII/ptolemy/domains/ptinyos/lib/NCComponent.nc"
Relative orientation of ports on the icon of this actor. The default value is an IntegerToken of value 90.
Displayed name on icon. The value is set to the name of the nesC component being represented. Otherwise, the name of this class is displayed.
